description:
The course " Change Your State Of Mind Using NLP And Anchoring Techniques " by Pradeep Aggarwal teaches you powerful NLP techniques on how to create a mind trigger to get a certain situation, feeling, positive attitude of a past in the current situation to help you achieve your goals faster. You will be able to get positive and confidence feeling of the past in a present tensed situation . You will be able to instantly change your state of mind from negative to positive and a more confident state of mind.

In this course you will not only learn how to create mind triggers for yourself but also be able to teach the same to your friends and family .

This course includes -

  • Lecture 1:Introduction To The Course
  • Lecture 2: What is anchoring and mind triggers
  • Lecture3:Learn how to create an anchor or mind trigger
  • Lecture4:Learn how to use an anchor or mind trigger successfully
  • Lecture5:What is collapsing anchor and its uses to overcome fears
  • Lecture6:Teach others on how to use anchors and mind triggers
  • Lecture 7: Summary of the course
title: Change Your State Of Mind Using NLP And Anchoring Techniques
